ygData.subject: Re: Spells
ygData.msgSnippet: I have just reached lvl 16 and now have the task of getting runes to make my spells. I gather I need to learn other languages to read the books, I sat talking
ygData.messageBody:
I have just reached lvl 16 and now have the task of getting runes to make my spells. I gather I need to learn other languages to read the books, I sat talking to another player to learn gnomish and over an hour it increased about 7 times. Is there some special way of learning this better or is there a list that contains the rune combinations as finding someone to talk to for hours is very hard.

Mryius
